line.comment: *do if $perk == 'All ships equiped with Quantum jumpgate extension' AND $noJump

line.text: 'See the Management section of the encyclopedia for details'

line.comment: * if not [THIS]-> get local variable: name='mayhem_uberSanctuary'
* add custom dynamic menu item to array $menu: text='Reset perks for 1 threat' return value='reset'
* add custom dynamic menu item to array $menu: text='Reset perks for 0 threat (first reset is free)' return value='reset'

sval.val: See the Management section of the encyclopedia for details
do if $perk == 'All ships equiped with Quantum jumpgate extension' AND $noJump
if not [THIS]-> get local variable: name='mayhem_uberSanctuary'
add custom dynamic menu item to array $menu: text='Reset perks for 1 threat' return value='reset'
add custom dynamic menu item to array $menu: text='Reset perks for 0 threat (first reset is free)' return value='reset'
